title: Trended 4/1: Ramadan, Northern Lights, Amazon, Cannabis, Jen Psaki, Morbius
itunes:title: Trended 4/1: Ramadan, Northern Lights, Amazon, Cannabis, Jen Psaki, Morbius
description:
In this edition of Trended, Miles and super producer Joelle discuss Ramadan 2022, the northern lights heading down south, the first Amazon warehouse to unionize, the House voting to decriminalize cannabis, Jen Psaki leaving the White House for MSNBC, and the incipient flop that is 'Morbius'.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
